bridge-type.label: Zabbix Server bloo
bridge-type.description: The Zabbix server which monitors devices

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: The hostname or IP address of the Zabbix server

parameter.name: apiUrl
parameter.label: API URL
parameter.description:
(optional)
URL of the Zabbix server API.
Use this if OpenHAB can't autodetect the API URL correctly

Default URL is: http(s)://{hostname}/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php
Example: https://mon.hostname.com:8443/weirdPath/api_jsonrpc.php

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in seconds.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host name
parameter.description: The Host name field as configured in Zabbix
